title: Daisy
notes:
Credits to artist: @amietita
Nintendo Latina Queen, I think the fact she had very spunky voicelines made me interested in her way more than any other character as a kid.

title: Teto
notes: I always liked Teto's design but more recently JamieP has really been getting me into the music.

title: Kris Deltarune
notes: Easy to say I love this game more than Undertale, Kris is just such an interesting character to follow around as a player.

title: Luz - Owl House
notes:
Credits to Artist: @okatah_
Owl House has made me want to become a witch on all levels, I love see so muuch of myself in every character but Luz I think has taught me alot about accepting myself.

title: Digital Circus
notes:
Credits to Artist: @GelyBean
Out of all Glitch Productions stuff, this is probably my favorite as a whole. I was already super into "I Have No Mouth, and I Must Scream" and this just brought that AI obsession back to me. Its hard to pick a favorite character here but Jax and Pomni are probably at the top.

title: my room is upside down - Deathbrain
notes: Album art for the track 'my room is upside down' by Deathbrain.
